title: Monocle Magazine, What typeface is used? \>\>\>\>\>\>
content:
There are two image attachments that I have  
sourced from the beautiful Magazine 'Monocle'.

I am trying to figure out what  
both of the typefaces are ....  
I would be very grateful if someone could  
help.. ??

Cheers !
